title: HTML CanvasShadows

metadata.description: Learn about HTML CanvasShadows with clear explanations and practical examples.

content_sections.title: Details
Example
content_sections.code:
<script>
const canvas = document.getElementById("myCanvas");
const ctx = canvas.getContext("2d");
// Shadow
ctx.shadowColor = "lightblue";
ctx.shadowOffsetX = 10;
ctx.shadowOffsetY 
  = 10;
// Filled rectangle
ctx.fillStyle = "blue";
ctx.fillRect(20, 
  20, 100, 100);
// Stroked rectangle
ctx.lineWidth = 4;
ctx.strokeStyle = "blue";
ctx.strokeRect(170, 20, 100, 100);
</script>
